mail_body:
Dear Mr. Lucas,

I am submitting my application for the Janitor position at IBM. My name is Jude Smiley and I am confident that my skills and experience make me an excellent candidate for this role.

I am an experienced Payroll Manager at KWS GmbH with an M.Sc in Finance. My job responsibilities involved using several computer softwares daily, which I am thoroughly proficient in. Along with attention to detail and critical thinking, I am determined to learn and provide reliable support in my work.

Furthermore, my hobby of coding and playing with computers has given me a deeper insight into technicalities while also honing my observation skills.

Your job description stated that you are looking for a cleaning person who values attention to detail, which is something I excel in. I believe that with my skills and experience, I would be able to provide immaculate cleaning and upkeep of the IBM facilities.

Thank you for taking the time to review my application, and I am excited to potentially work with you.

Sincerely,
Jude Smiley
